meanings.sent1: I will pretrim the bushes before the party.
meanings.sent2: She always pretrims her hair before a special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to pretrim the vegetables, but then realized he had the wrong ones!
meanings.sent4: Before the big event, it's important to pretrim any unnecessary details.
meanings.sent5: Remember to pretrim the excess fabric before sewing the final seam.

meanings.sent1: The pretrim fabric was ready for the sewing project.
meanings.sent2: He bought pretrim flowers for the vase.
meanings.sent3: The pretrim cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: She admired the pretrim edges of the quilt.
meanings.sent5: The pretrim tree branches made the garden look neat and tidy.
